text: daesunlye(ui gigan)neun jal allyeojin dal-ila. geu ttae daesunlyeleul gyeolsimhan janeun seongjisunlyesi oeseolseuleon malgwa geoyeog haeng-wiwa nonjaeng-i geumjidoenola. geudaedeul-i haenghaneun geu eotteohan seonhaengdo hananimkkeseoneun algo gyesinola. geuligo geudaedeul-eun yeohaeng-gil-ui siglyang-eul junbihala. yeohaeng-gil-ui gajang hullyunghan siglyang-eun gyeong-oesim-ila. seulgileul jinin jadeul-iyeo, naleul gyeong-oehala
